name: Melatonin (High-Dose Longevity)
description: Higher-dose melatonin (3-20mg) used specifically for longevity and anti-cancer purposes, distinct from low-dose sleep use. Acts as a potent mitochondrial antioxidant, immune modulator, and has direct anti-cancer properties via oncostatic mechanisms.

dosage.notes: Higher doses for longevity/anti-cancer distinct from sleep dose (0.3-1mg). Extended-release preferred. Take 1hr before bed.

keyFindings: 10mg dose showed anti-cancer effects as adjuvant therapy in multiple RCTs
Concentrates in mitochondria — 10x more potent there than in cytosol
Extended lifespan in multiple animal models at higher doses
sideEffects: Possible hormone disruption at very high doses
